titles.title: STEP Up Act of 2005
Summer Term Education Programs for Upward Performance Act of 2005
A bill to authorize resources to provide students with opportunities for summer learning through summer learning grants.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 12/20/2005--Introduced. Summer Term Education Programs for Upward Performance Act of 2005, or STEP UP Act of 2005 - Directs the Secretary of Education to make competitive demonstration grants to state educational agencies to pay the federal share of summer learning grants for eligible students to be summer scholars in summer learning opportunity programs.
